entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
